title: Bug 45145: Second window comes to front when using first
OB: When switching from another application to one Eclipse window, and then clicking on a docked view or perspective, the other window comes to the front and overlaps the windows of other applications.
EB: I expect the clicked docked view or perspective to come to the front within the selected Eclipse window, without overlapping or moving the windows of other applications.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open two Eclipse windows. 2. Switch from another application to one of the Eclipse windows. 3. Click on a docked view or perspective in the selected Eclipse window. 4. Observe that the other Eclipse window comes to the front and overlaps the windows of other applications.
